reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable, soft, and true to size, with one mentioning it's perfect for chilly days.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Cute!!!!!!!!!!!
items.body: This sweater is really nice quality.....I love the sleeves! The cuffs are very nice and snug for a chilly day...I don't like cuffs that are so loose that the sweater rises up on your arms when you move.........it's going to look great with high waisted jeans with boots in the winter!!! I think I need to buy another color!! I highly recommend! For reference, I got a size M and I am 5'5" and 134 pounds Read more
items.author: Michael Paul Burton

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sweater
items.body: Love this sweater! Great quality and softness. It also was the perfect length I was looking for in this style. Also is very warm and thick. Read more
items.author: Kellie

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Warm and cute
items.body: A little longer than I would have liked so I cut the bottom. Read more
items.author: LeaDan

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable
items.body: Soft fabric, so cute paired with a high waisted skirt or pants. Read more
items.author: D. Rogers

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable
items.body: Pleasantly surprised with the quality of this top very cute and comfortable Read more
items.author: Larsen Products

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars No thanks
items.body: I really wanted to love the Imily Bela Cropped Sweater, but unfortunately it just didn’t live up to the price. The style is cute in the photos—slouchy, trendy, and the lantern sleeves are a nice idea—but the quality just doesn’t match what you’d expect. The material feels thinner and cheaper than I anticipated, and it doesn’t have that soft, cozy texture a sweater at this price point should have. The fit is also a bit awkward: the body is cropped but the sleeves are overly baggy in a way that doesn’t look stylish—just sloppy. After a couple of wears, I also noticed slight pilling, which was disappointing. Overall, it looks cute online, but the quality and fit don’t justify the cost. I’d save your money and look for a better-made cropped sweater elsewhere Read more
items.author: Lhab

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars You NEED this!
items.body: Great find, you’ll will really love this sweater, it is a lighter sweater, the sleeves are just adorable, and it fits perfectly. It’s just right. Overall, this style is very flattering and I love the material. True to size, comfortable fit, super chic, & in the perfect color…score! Read more
items.author: Steph.didit

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too short
items.body: It is a very pretty sweater and I wanted a crop sweaters because I am very short and petite but this sweater was a.little too shirt for me and it shouldn't be. I have a short sleeve crop shirt that is 16 in long this sweater said it was 17 inches long but it was shorter on me than my shirt is and I don't want my stomach showing to much especially in the winter. 17 inches should have been plenty long for me but the sweater was too short so it is either mis marked or my t shirt thst fits perfectly and is not to short is wrong. I believe the sweater is wrong sizing long ways. It fit but was just too short. Read more
items.author: HH

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Off-white, Wine Red, Khaki, White, Black, Green, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
